topics.body:
Sorry if this is More of a videogame thing but the "writer for the metal gear movie":http://www.siliconera.com/2015/03/31/metal-gear-solid-movie-to-be-helmed-by-british-writer-jay-basu/ has been announced and its Jay Basu. And if you never heard of him well here is his filmography on IMDB...
!https://40.media.tumblr.com/5fa162b8229731f0daf72e6a7855eb2f/tumblr_nm1veelujR1rslk3oo2_1280.jpg!
!https://41.media.tumblr.com/d135270d1234e6d173eb452450f084bd/tumblr_nm1veelujR1rslk3oo3_1280.jpg!
And I heard that he co wrote for a script that was voted runner up in the annual brit awards for unproduced screenplays. Which means the best thing he ever did was a movie that never got made. This does not give me any high hopes for this movie.
